function flower(px,py)
 local s=0.05
 for i=1,10 do
  local a=pi*2*i/10
  point(px+cos(a)*s,py+sin(a)*s,1)
 end
end

function tree(px,py,a,size,left,right,len)
 local ca,sa=cos(a),sin(a)
 local nx,ny=px+ca*size,py+sa*size
 line(px,py,nx,ny,0.3)
 if len>0 then
  tree(nx,ny,a+left,size*0.9,left,right,len-1)
  tree(nx,ny,a-right,size*0.9,left,right,len-1)
 else
  flower(nx,ny)
 end
end

function update()
 local t=getTime()
 camera(0,0.5,0.7)
 line(-100,0,100,0,0.3)
 local left=sin(t)*0.05+0.4
 local right=sin(t*0.7)*0.05+0.4
 tree(0,0,pi*0.5,0.3,left,right,5)
end
